short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A user-friendly and straightforward extension to keep you organized and productive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TaskEase is a minimalist and easy-to-use Chrome extension that helps you stay organized and on top of your tasks. With TaskEase, you can create a to-do list, track your progress, and efficiently manage your daily activities.

Key Features:

Create and Check Off Tasks: Easily add new tasks to your list with a single click. Check off completed tasks to stay motivated and organized.

Edit Tasks with Ease: Double-click on any task to quickly edit its text. No more hassle in making changes to your to-do items.

Task Count: Stay informed with the total number of tasks in your list, so you always know how much you have on your plate.

Why Install TaskEase?

Simplicity: TaskEase is designed to be straightforward and minimalistic, ensuring a clutter-free experience.
Efficiency: Effortlessly manage your tasks and stay focused on what matters most.
Visual Satisfaction: Enjoy the satisfying light blue check-off animation when completing tasks.
Quick Editing: Edit your tasks with ease using the double-click functionality.
Convenient Task Count: Instantly view the number of tasks to plan your day effectively.
Persistent Storage: Your tasks are saved and retrieved even when you switch between tabs or reopen the extension.


Take control of your daily tasks and improve your productivity with TaskEase. Install now and transform your task management experience!
